11112.content:
Joe grabed Nick's hands and Kevin stradled Nick's waist. " No guys! Please stop this now! This isn't working anyway! " Nick tried to sound tough.
" So this won't tickle?" Kevin said as he lightly crawled his fingers down Nick's arms. The more Nick giggled, he started back at the top and went farther.
" HAHAHAHHAHAHHAHAKEVVVVVVVVVVVYYYYYSTOOOOPPPPPPPPPPLLLLEEEAAASSSEEE!" Joe started to tickle Nick's belly softly.
" Awww is little Nicky ticklish? Is my little baby brother ticklish here?" Joe was smiling, enjoying being the older brother.
"YEEEEEEEEEEEESSSSSSSSSHHHHHHAAAAAAAAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAPPPPPLEEEASSEEEE SSSTOPPPPPHHHHHAAAAAAAHHAHAHAHHA"
" Ok, let's give him a break." Kevin said withdrawing his hands. Joe ran his fingers through Nick's messy,sweaty hair and gave him a brotherly kiss on the forehead. He knew how it was to be the yourger brother and to suffer one of Kevin's tickle torures, but of course Joe didn't have TWO older brothers to torure him.
" Ok,,,,, where to start next? Oh I know!" Kevin said grinning. He lowered his fingers onto Nick's armpits. Joe then reached over and tickled Nick's ribs.
"NOOOOOOOOOONNNOTTTTTHHHAAAATHEREPLLEEASENOOTTTHEREHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHPLEASLE JOEPLEASEKEVIN!" Poor Nick was laughing so hard that his ears were ringing.
After 5 minutes, Kevin and Joe stopped. " Ok man, I think he's had enough."
"Oh really," Kevin gave Joe a evil brother grin that meant only one thing. Before he could run, Kevin grabbed Joe and sat on both him and Nick. Then he tied Joe's hands to the bedpost." Now I have two vitams to torure!"
Joe and Nick shared a look.They both knew they were in for it.

1111311.content:
Nick emerges a few moments later wearing only a towel around his waist and using another one to dry his hair. His tan, hairy, six pack ab chest is still slightly wet as well as his bare feet. He returns to his bedroom and puts on a new pair of boxers.
He walks out into the living room and discovers his younger brother Joe asleep on the couch. He sneaks up on his brother and begins to lightly tickle his socked feet hanging over the arm of the sofa. Joe's feet twitch and Joe's body squirms a little saying slurringly "Stop tickling my feet Rosie, my feet are ticklish!"
Nick continues his light tickle-fest as he begins to tickle Joe's bare legs. He then slowly begins to peel Joe's right sock off his foot. As the sock comes off exposing Joe's lightly tan, semi-hairy bare foot with trimmed toes, Nick tickles Joe's bare soles and toes, then nibbles on Joe's big toe before engulfing it into his mouth. Joe's other toes splay as Nick peels off Joe's other sock from his foot revealing another bare foot. Nick does the same on Joe's left bare soles and toes causing Joe to splay all of his toes.
Joe murmurs "Oh Rosie, I love it when you suck and nibble on my toes." Nick smiles and tries not to laugh. After kissing his brother's toes one more time, Nick begins to put Joe's socks back on his feet. Joe's bare feet pull away as he murmurs "I want to stay barefoot Rosie, keep my socks off please." Nick pulls off Joe's right sock and taps his brother's bare feet than leaves.

choices: Skip 'em both and just enjoy the sun on the beach
12.content:
Joe rubbed the sleep out of his eyes and sat up in bed, stretching his arms over his head. The summer sun peaked through his blinds, slightly illuminating his otherwise dark room. He was glad he had decided to take this solo trip to the beach; it was nice to wake up naturally, rather than by jumped on by his youngest brother. Not to say that he didn't miss his family-even so, sometimes you just need a break, you know?

He pushed the covers to one side of the bed and placed his feet on the hardwood floor, yawning and scratching his head. He walked to the window and pushed it open, the warm air took him off guard and he took a step back. The beach looked amazing, the waves were just right for surfing and the sand couldn't have looked more inviting. Today was going to be a great day! There was a sand castle competition on the beach today and Joe was really looking forward to participating. He had recently cut his hair (quite drastically-it resembled his style when he first started out with brothers) and so he didn't expect too many people to recognize him, especially without his brothers around. He just wanted to be able to have fun without crowds of people surrounding him. However, he also really wanted to try his hand at surfing. He needed to decide which to do first...

He grabbed a towel, his bag, pulled a shirt over his head and slipped his feet into his flip-flops and ran out the back door onto the smooth sand.

Where should Joe head first?

"Oh, Crap!" they said together, "We only have 1 hour to the rest of the chores!"
They rushed out of the bathroom and went to finish the chores.

1411211221.content:
Nick: You know, Joe? I'm so glad that the place you got stuck in was the bathroom.
Joe: (Nervously) Why?
Nick: Oh, you'll see...

Nick takes lotion from the cabinet and thoroughly rubs both of Joe's feet with it.

Nick: Feels good, huh?
Joe: (Extremely relaxed) Uh, huh. This is so-

Nick takes Joe's electric toothbrush from the counter, turns it on, and scrubs Joe's big toe with it.

Joe: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAH!!! HAAAAAACOMEON!!! STOP ITTTTT NIIIICK!!! ICAN'TTAKEITTT!!! NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! NOT MY BIG TOOOOOOOE! NOTTHETOE-NOTTHETOE-NOTTHETOE-HO-HO-HOOOOOO! AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!! (screams like a crazed idiot)

1411211221.title: Nick continues tickling Joe

14112112211.content:
Joe's face is covered in sweat, tears, and uncontrollable rage!

Nick: (starting to get nervous) ...I went a little over the line, didn't I?
Joe: (laughs quietly) Just a little? JUST A LITTLE?! YOU BETTER RUN YOU -

They here Kevin, Frankie, and their parents pulling in.

Joe: Oh, man! We didn't finish our chores! We're so -
Nick: Wait! (looking at how sweaty Joe is) I've got an idea! Get in your bed quickly.

14112112211.title: Uh, oh!

141121122112.content:
Nick: Well you see...maybe five minutes after you guys left, Joe nearly fainted!
Mrs. Jonas: (getting that "suspicious mother" look) Nicholas Jerry Jonas, are you lying?
Joe: (walks out of his room sleepily - his being barefoot implies he was asleep) Oh, hey Mom. 'Sup?
Mrs. Jonas: (still skeptical) Nick tells me that you almost fainted. Is that true.
Joe: Wha...oh. Nah, I'm just really (convincing yawn) sleepy.
Mrs. Jonas (now with the "worried mother" look) See? I told you not to stay up so late. I'm just glad you didn't fall down the stairs!
Joe and Nick: (silence)
Mrs. J: Gasp! Did you?!
Joe: Uhh...
Mrs. J: Oh, Joseph! (hugs him) You know what? I want you in that be right now! Get more sleep, young man!
Joe: (pretends to pout a little) Yes, Mom.
Mrs. J: (turns to Kevin) Sweetie, I told you to stay home with them. Now look what happened! As the oldest...
Kevin: Sigh. I need to be responsible. Sorry, Mom.

Their mother walks downstairs. Once out of her range hearing, Kevin glares at his two brothers.

Kevin: (high-level sarcasm) Wow, guys, thanks a lot! Now Mom's blaming me for something that didn't even happen.
Nick: (innocently gasps) Big brother! How could you accuse us of lying to sweet, sweet, Mother?
Kevin: Keep tellin' yourself that. This isn't over, (mock politeness) sweet, sweet, brothers.
141121122112.title: Nick's plan works

142.title: Nick and Kevin

144.content:
The Jonas Brothers were kinapped and now they are in a tickle ward, they don't know why, but they are in three separated rooms, tied to metal tables, and each one has a personal tickle doctor.

Which should start first?
144.title: All of Them!

1443.content:
Dr. Overs walked down the hallway to the fourth room on the left. Slowly he opened the door, peering in he saw a curly haired boy, maybe about 16/17 lying on his stomach, on a table, his arms raised above his head, and his ankles, spread eagle, tied,keeping ahold of two bare feet so they wouldn't run off.

"Nicholas Jonas" the doctor said, smiling as he looked at his clipboard.Nick stopped struggling when he heard his name. He slowly twisted his head around and looked at his tormentor. Nick looked scared, and nervous. Dr. Overs grunted and went over to him.

"How are you today, you are in the tickle ward, why you're here I cannot say, but I am your tickle doctor, Dr. Overs" Overs explained.

"Y-you're going to tickle me?" Nick asked, a look of confusion showing on his features. Dr. Overs nodded and smiled, closing his eyes. Nick sweardropped. He hated being tickled. All his life he'd either been tickled by his Mom, Dad, even his brothers still held him down and tickled him, whenever they can.

"So how ticklish are you Nick?" Overs asked, leaning down looking Nick directly in the face. Nick backed away, untrusting .He tried to lie.

"I'm not ticklish" he said, seriously, glaring at the doctor. Dr. Overs laughed and shook his head.

"Of course you aren't" he said, he began to walk away, and at first Nick thought it actually worked...that is until he felt something stroking his underarm. Nick tried to wiggle away, but the fingers of Dr. Overs followed his every movement.

"Not ticklish, huh?" Overs asked, laughing. A few giggles escaped from Nick's mouth, and he hoped Williams didn't notice. He noticed alright.

"Are you going to laugh for me, or just do that little giggle of yours?" Overs asked, he sped up the stroking of Nick's underarms, and Nick gradually started laughing.

"St-stahap plehease HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STOP!" Nick cried, trying to pull his arms down,as Dr. Overs started to speed up faster and faster.

"You're a liar" Dr. Overs said, chuckling "You know what I do to liars?" Nick slowly opened one eye (it's hard to keep your eyes open when being tickled) and looked at Overs. Overs smiled down at him and stopped his underarm tickling, giving Nick time to breathe.

Dr. Overs went over to the desk at the side of the bed and went rumaging through one of the drawrers. Nick watched him with a nervous expression. Finally after a few seconds, Overs found what he was looking for, and he brought it out for Nick to see. It was one of those mechanical toothbrushes. Nick only had a feeling of where he was going to get it next, and he wasn't going to like it.

"I won't use this on you yet, but be assured I will use it" Dr. Overs said, putting the toothbrush on the desk. But he wasn't giving Nick a break. Next he went to.......
1443.title: Nick

14431.content:
Next he went to Nick's feet, held in place by a thick rope around his ankles.
"Let's see just how ticklish you are." Dr. Overs began, "Starting with you're piggies." Overs grabbed Nick's big toe between his thumb and pointer finger. "This little piggy whent to market." Overs said as he wiggled the toe enticeing a strained giggle from the captive Jonas Brother. "This little piggy stayed home." Dr. Overs continued, repeating what he did with the first toe on the second one, and so on. "This little piggy ate roast beef." Nick began to grunt, as he held back hiis laughter. "This little piggy had none." Nick struggled, he knew what would happen next, then ehat felt like a shot of lightning jumped through Nick's body, "and this little piggy, he cried wee, wee, wee all the way home." Overs moved his agile fingers to the balls of Nicks feet without giving Nick a moment's breath.
"N-n-no, st-stop!" Nick managed to spout, befor an onslaught of laughter filled the room again. "P-please, Ahhh HA, No more! Phhth." To nicks suprize Dr. Overs did as he had asked, he stoppedwith the foot, but what Nick didn't notice was Overs reaching for the bag he had brought in. Overs rummaged through the bag for a second befor pulling out exactly what he wanted. A white, almost angelic feather. The sides very downy and soft.
"Now we really get to see how ticklish you are." Then . . .
14431.title: little piggies

This Story contains the tickling of the three Jonas brothers in the band. These are real people sponsored by Hollywood and Columbia records, they have a tv show, on disney channel called Living the Dream.
